title: 44 How Sweetgreen is Becoming the Next Fast Casual Unicorn
description: On this episode of the Barron Report Live, host Paul Barron discusses which wing-focused restaurant brand is taking on pizza for the next Super Bowl, the fire sale of Diageo’s liquor brands, and how Sweetgreen becoming the next food unicorn in the fast casual industry.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
